RT‚ÄÇSam Williams üêò
üö®Competition: Build the best degen-friendly start-from-zero coding tutorial for launching a basic web app on the permaweb.
Target audience is someone who would call themselves @asscrusader420 online üòÑ
No more than 5 minutes between memes.
Prize: $2500 in AR
Deadline: 30 Apr

Sam Williams üêò:‚ÄÇDegens: What would it take for you to quit trading and start building?
The control you have on likelihood of a positive financial outcome is far higher, and the work is much more meaningful.
Do we need a coding bootcamp with more dank memes or something? ü§î
